concept.title: CMM support for LI field debugging enhancements - phase 2 (Feature f10326-02)
concept.shortdesc: This feature introduces the possibility to output lawful interception interface and link information with liconf command for troubleshooting purposes. The usage of this feature is targeted to trusted 3LS/4LS member.

conbody.p: Results of command execution is visible on li.log.
Dumping is supported for following interfaces or links:

ul.li: x1Intf - X1 interface supporting 2G, 3G and 4G technologies
x1Link - X1 link supporting 2G, 3G and 4G technologies
x2Intf - X2 interface supporting 2G, 3G and 4G technologies
x2Link - X2 link supporting 2G, 3G and 4G technologies
x3Intf - X3 interface supporting 2G and 3G technologies
x3Link - X3 link supporting 2G and 3G technologies
